And then hold the external part of the ear to some pieces of cloth or wool, and stretch the ear towards the back, as warmth is often forgotten due to these causes.
E si no n’es getada, lahoras aministra extraccio de lu am le instrument apelat gesti epicicarios subtil del qual aquesta es la forma:	And if warmth is not gained, then administer the extraction of it using an instrument called a gentle epichorionic, whose form is as follows:
E si es foro-getada am gesti, bo es; e sino, lahoras aministra la extraccio de lu am onci subtil de pauca duplicacio.	And if it is forgotten using the gesture, then it is; otherwise, administer the extraction of it with a very thin instrument with double folding.
E donc si no es foro-getada per aquo, lahoras fay una canula de aram e entromet la extremitat de la canula en le trauc de la aurelha e claus a l’enviro de la canula am cera e am oli mollificada per so que no sia ubert sino la canula.	And therefore, if this is not forgotten, make a cannula of aram and insert the end of the cannula into the canal of the ear and close around the cannula with wax and softened oil so that only the cannula opens.
E aprop extratz am le tieu vent am fort atraccio, quar tropas veguadas cum aquo que havem recontat.	And then extract the small wind with strong attraction, as we have seen with these examples.
Mays si no es foro-getada en aquesta manieyra, lahoras pren de halka alumbat o de vecz aparelhat am le qual son preses les ausels una patita quantitat, e pausa aquel en la extremitat de ray, e aprop envolopa sobre aquel coto decentment pausat.	If this is not forgotten in this manner, take a piece of hot coals or some old apparatus with which the tools are heated, place a small amount on the end of the instrument, and wrap it neatly around the limb.
E aprop entromet aquel en le trauc de la aurelha am facilitat, e aprop excicca la aurelha de la humiditat.	And then insert it into the ear canal with ease and remove the ear from the humidity.
E donc si no es foro-getada am totas las causas las quals havem recontadas, lahoras tu coyta a talhar aquela denant que endevengua apostema caut o espasme.	And therefore, if all the causes we have seen are not forgotten, then you should cut off that which causes abscess or spasm.
E la manieyra de talhar aquela es que tu al comensament sancnes le malaute de la vena sephasica e extratz del sanc segon la mannieyra de la vertut de lu, e aprop fay aquel cezer entre las tuas mas e converteys l’aurelha a las partidas desus, e fen am petita fissura en la razit de la aurelha deves lo greys de lu en le loc be premegut de lu.	And the method of amputation is that you begin by cauterizing the malady from the saphetic vein and extract the blood according to the virtue of it, then make an incision between your fingers and turn the edge towards the parts above, and make a small fissure at the base of the edge where the thickest part of the malady is pressed against.
E sia la fissura de figura lunar entro que pervengua a la peyra, e, la peyra atrobada, osta aquela si podes am instrumentz apropriatz; e aprop cos la fissura en aquela hora am velocitat, e cura aquela entro que sia sanat.	And if the fissure reaches the pear (toes), and the toe is discolored, stop it if you can with appropriate instruments; then quickly make the cut at that time, and treat the wound until it heals.
E si la causa cazent en la aurelha es un dels gras que creysso e so inflatz, lahoras aministra la curacio e la extraccio de lu; mays si no obezeys a tu ad eyssiment, lahoras tu pren spatum teune subtil segon aquesta forma:	And if the cause of the pain in the toe is one of the swollen and inflated gratings (tissue), then administer treatment and extract it; but if you do not obey my advice, then take some gentle suction with a small tube according to this method:
e aministra am aquel la abscizio de aquel gra lo qual es cazut en l’aurelha.	and administer the removal of that grating (tissue) which has fallen into the toe.
E no fassas aquo quan cogitas que aquel ja es humectat per la vapor del aurelha, e pausa aquel en motas pessas, e prop extratz ne aquelas am les oncis o am gesti subtil, o ab inscizio ayssi co dit havem, quar es alleujada la extraccio de lu.	And do not attempt this when you think the affected area is already moistened by heat, place it on heavy weights, or extract it with incisions or delicate movements, or by incision as we have said, for this facilitates its extraction.
Mays en l’aygua la qual es intrada en l’aurelha cove que·l malaute use de sternutacio am condizi al comensament, e omple la sieua aurelha am alcu coto vielh, e jagua sobre aquela aurelha en la qual es l’aygua, e si per aquo es foro-getada, bo es; e sino, lahoras pren tropas peyras teunas e leons segon la longitut del dit, e calfa aquelas en le foc un pauc, e le pacient entrometa una de aquelas en le trauc de la sua aurelha e saute sobre la un pe sieu de aquela partida e percussia am una autra peyra sobre la peyra la qual es dintz la aurelha.	In water into which the ear has been immersed, there is a remedy for this condition at the beginning, and it fills the ear with some very thin straw or similar material, and then you should press on the ear in which the water is, and if it is thus expelled, it is good; otherwise, take some small stones and lions according to their length, warm them slightly in the fire, and the patient should insert one of these into the opening of his ear and jump on it with one foot, striking another stone against the one inside the ear.
Donc no cesse aquo am peyra entro que tota l’aygua sia foro-getada.	Therefore, continue this with the stone until all the water is expelled.
E ja l’aygua sira foro-getada enayssi que tu prenguas de papier o de gonc i, e met la una extremetat de lu en l’aurelha e estendas l’autre extremitat am foc entro que sia comburit le may de lu.	And already the water has been drawn out thus: take paper or cloth and place one end of it in the ear and extend the other end towards the fire until the whole length is burned.
E prop met i autre gonc e fay aquo tantas veguadas entro que tota l’aygua sia foro-getada, e stratz aquel am canula ayssi co desus es dit de la peyra extrasadora.	Then take another cloth and do this as many times as necessary until all the water is drawn out, and stretch that over the eardrum as they call it in the extractor from stone.
Mays en la extraccio de bestia intrant en aquela aurelha, si es a petit cos, ayssi piussa e a lu semblant, cura aquel ayssi cum havem dit en la divisio; mays si es de gran cos la qual causa apar al sen del vezement, lahoras aministra la extraccio de lu am gesti e oncis, e la causa de lu es pus leugiera de totas las autras causas que cazo en l’aurelha.	In the extraction of a foreign body from the ear, if it is small and resembles one of those already mentioned, treat it as we have said in the previous division; but if it is a large object that causes an obstruction to the sense of hearing, then perform the extraction with forceps and scissors, and the cause should be removed as lightly as possible from all other causes that affect the ear.
Mays en la extraccio de verm engendrat en la aurelha, quan tu curas aquel am aquo que havem dit en la divisio e en le tractat de distillacios e no comfereys la tua curacio, lahoras cove que tu reguardes la aurelha al solelh.	But in the extraction of worms that have formed in the ear, when you treat it with water as we have said in the division and in the treatment of distillations and do not follow up your care, then be aware to protect the ear from sunlight.
E donc si apar aqui alcuna causa dels verms, lahoras extratz aquel am gesti o am onci subtils, mays si no apar deguna causa, lahoras pren una canula dejos streyta e desus ampla de la qual aquesta es la forma de lu:	And so if any cause of the worms appears here, then extract them with your fingers or some subtle tools, but if no cause appears, take a narrow cannula and make it wide on both ends, the shape of which is like this:
E entromet la extremitat subtil en la aurelha segon la quantitat la qual suffertar puesca le malaute; e aprop sucgeys am aquela per succio fort, e fay aquo motas veguadas, entro que totz les verms sian foro-gitatz.	Then insert the subtle end of the instrument into the ear according to the amount of pain the patient suffers; and with a strong suction, suck it out, making movements until all the worms are removed.
Mays si no obezeysso a tu al ayssiment, lahoras tu opila e claus en le circuit de la canula am cera ayssi cum havem dit; lahoras aministre distillacios las quals han ja esproadas les antics en la curacio dels verms, e atrobaras aquo en le tractat de distillacios.	If you do not obey these instructions, then fold and close the end of the cannula with wax as we have said; administer distilled liquids that have already been prepared in ancient remedies for worm treatments, which you will find in the treatise on distills.
E sia la tua efusio am la qual efundas les olis medicinas en la aurelha am aquest strument del qual aquesta es la forma de lu:	And let your flow be the one that pours medical oils into the ear using this instrument, whose shape is as follows:
E fay aquela de argent o de eram, dejos streyt, en le qual sia un petit trauc, e am pla desus.	And make that of silver or brass, leave it straight, in which there is a small hole, and flatten it on top.
E donc sia cum empellent a que es en la conquavitat de la canula de continent aqui on sira necessari.	And thus it is with the use of what is in the cavity of the container that this procedure becomes necessary.
E si vols, pren le ray e envolveys en la extremitat de lu decentment coto, e aprop gieta oli en la concavitat del auziment, o suc de alcuna herba, o aquo que vols de aquestas medicinas en la canula — e aquela es en la aurelha —, e aprop entromet le ray am coto desus e exprem am la tua ma aquel am compressio temprada de lu entro que l’oli sia expellit en la concavitat del auziment e le malaute senta le oli dedintz.	And if you want, take the ray and wrap it at the decent end, then pour oil into the cavity of the hearing aid, or juice from some herb, or any substance from these medicines in the canula — it is in the ear —, and then insert the ray into the coil above and press with your hand to create compression, so that the oil is expelled into the cavity of the hearing aid and the patient feels the oil inside.
E aquo que sia enfundut en la aurelha sia ja scalfat am foc un petit.	And what is inserted into the ear should already be scorched with a small flame.
E guarda te que la causa la qual distillaras en l’aurelha no sia trop frega, quar las medicinas de aurelha no suffertan aquo.	And be careful that the cause which you distil in the ear is not too harsh, for the ear medicines do not tolerate this.
Capitol .vii.	Chapter .VII.
De curacio de opilacio de aurelhas.	On the treatment of ear infections.
Alcunas veguadas alcus enfantz yeysso dels ventres de lors mayres no-perforatz, e aquo ja accideys en alcus homes, opilacio en le meat de la aurelha per plagua o per carn nada en aquela; e aquesta opilacio alcunas veguadas es fayta en le preon del trau de la aurelha la qual no consiec le vezement, e alcunas veguadas es en las partidas defora.	Sometimes, children's bellies can become infected without any apparent reason, and this also happens in some adults, an ear infection due to a plague or flesh damage in that area; and this infection can sometimes occur at the base of the ear lobe, which is not always felt, or it can be external.
E aquela que accideys en le preon de lu, la qual no comprehen le vezement, es en las majors disposicios de dificil sanacio.	And those that occur at the base, which do not understand the cause, are in the most difficult situations to heal.
E en aquela en qual consegueys le vezement, cove que tu pauses la aurelha del malaute al solelh e reguarda en aquela.	And in those where you can see the cause, take the patient's ear to the sun and examine it.
E donc si vezes oppulacio apparent, obre aquela am espatum subtil del qual aquesta es la forma de lu:	And so if there appears an increase in volume, open that thin blade of which this is the shape:
Si’ la extremitat de lu en la qual sia petita la latitut, del qual la una partida sia aguda e l’autra no; e le spatum sia de dos latz leon per so que no fassa lizio al aurelha.	If the end of the blade where the width is reduced is pointed on one side and not on the other, and the blade has two sharp edges so as not to hurt the ear.
E donc si la opilacio es per carn nascuda en la aurelha o en le meat de lu, lahoras te aquela am oncis subtils e incidiys aquela vehement facilitat entro que sia ostada tota la carn.	And therefore if the swelling is due to flesh grown in the ear or in the blade itself, then use those delicate scissors and cut with a sharp ease until all the flesh is removed.
E si opilacio es en le preon de la aurelha, lahoras pren ray subtil leon e escalfa aquel am foc un pauc, e aprop met aquel en le meat de l’aurelha.	And if the swelling is in the base of the ear, take a thin needle, heat it slightly with fire, and then insert that into the flesh of the ear.
E donc si as scentit oppulacio am aquo que le malaute atroba am facilitat, per gravetat de ausir, esforsa la oppressio de lu am facilitat; e guarda te que no plagues les nervis del aurelha.	And therefore if you feel a swelling that the patient perceives as easy to drain, because of urgency, apply pressure to the swelling to facilitate drainage; and be careful not to harm the nerves of the ear.
E aprop pausa en l’aurelha drap de li segon la quantitat del ample del trauc lo qual tu as envolvutz en l’enguent egipciac; e fay aquo per alcus jorns entro que sias segur de la consolidacio de la plagua; o que prenguas qualgua e enfon aquela en ayguaros e pulveriza sobre lu segi trissat e usa de lu; e si vezes la aurelha ja esser apostemada, lahoras cove que tu estraguas la qualgua e permutes aquela am autra qualgua la qual tu envoloparas en cerot que sia fayt am oli rozat, entro que sia le apostema caut cedat; e aprop cura aquel entro que sia sanat.	And then place the appropriate bandage on the wound, covering it with a clean cloth soaked in Egyptian ointment; do this for several days until you are certain of the healing of the sore; or soak some and apply it to the affected area, using it every third day; if the sore has already formed pus, be careful not to spill it and replace it with other clean cloth soaked in oil, as long as the pustule gradually subsides; and tend to that until it is healed.
Mays si accideys flux de sanc, lahoras submergeys esponga o drap en aygua frega e pausa sobre la aurelha, e usa del autra curacio la qual restrengeys le flux del sanc, la qual es dita en le tractat de distillacio.	If a flux of blood occurs, immerse a cloth or drape in warm water and apply it to the wound; use another method of treatment that stops the flow of blood, as described in the distillation treatise.
Capitol .viii.	**Capitol VIII.**
De cura de athezil le qual endeveno a las palpebras.	On the treatment of atrophy affecting the eyelids.
Athezil les quals endeveno a las paupebras dels huels alcuna veguada so humitz, alscunas veguadas son secs.	Dry the eyelids of the eyes with some humidity at times, sometimes they are dry.
Donc cove que tu tenguas aquels am tenhalhas o am onci, e inscindas aquels am espatum de las suas razitz, e aprop pausa sobre les locs segi trissat.	So you should have those tenacled or hooked instruments, and cut off the spikes from their roots, and then place your hand over the sites marked with three incisions.
Mays si dolor am flux de sanc veno, lahoras tu cauteriza aquels am cauteri lanticular subtil.	If the pain flows with warm blood, then cauterize those points with a fine, sharp cautery.
E la milhor cauterizacio es aprop las inscizios e tropas veguadas retornam quan reman alcuna causa de sas razitz; e quan so cauterizadas am foc, aquelas razitz son comburidas e no retornan.	And the best cautery is to make incisions and return them when there is no cause for their roots; and when they are cauterized with fire, those roots are burned and do not return.
Capitol .ix.	Chapter IX.
Cura de grandeyssa que veno a las palpebras dels huels.	Treatment for a serious condition that comes to the eyelids of the eyes.
Motas veguadas endeve en las palpebras dels huels alcuna causa la qual es asemblada a grandissa en sa fortalicia e duricia, e per so grandissia es apelada.	Clouds seen on the eyelids of the eyes have some cause that is assembled into great strength and hardness, and therefore it is called great.
E es agreguacio de humiditat grossa en la palpebra dejos e desus.	And there is addition of a thick humidity on the lower and upper eyelids.
Donc la opperacio en lor es que consideras lahoras si la grandissia es procedent en lu en aquo que apar de la palpebra e es mauguda a tota partida; e la causa de lu es leugiera.	Therefore, the operation on them is that you consider when the great swelling appears in the part coming from the eyelid and is increased throughout; and the cause of it is slight.
Donc fen sobre aquela am fissura per la latitut, e aprop escorga aquela de tota partida am facilitat entro que evasesca, e aprop suspen aquela am onci e abscindeys aquela.	Therefore, open that small fissure by its width, and remove it from everywhere with ease as you evacuate it; and then suspend that one from above and cut off that one.
Mays si a tu no es apparelhada la incizio de lu si no pus que penetras la palpebra am inscizio pauc a pauc, lahoras aquo no notz en deguna causa.	But if you cannot start the incision of it unless you penetrate the eyelid with a small incision little by little, then this will not be noticed for any cause.
E si la figura es gran, lahoras tu l’ajusta am sutura; e cura aquela entro que sia sanada.	And if the wound is large, you will adjust it with stitches; and treat it until it heals.
E si es pauca, a tu no sobrevindra mal per aquela quar l’anguent de lu restaura aquela e encarna.	And if it is small, you will not suffer much because the pain of the wound restores and incarnates itself.
E si la grandissia es declinant a las partidas dedintz de la palpebra deves la superficia dedintz, lahoras evesa la palpebra e suspen la grandissia am onci, otra que tu indigescas de incizio, e prem aquela de tota part, e si la palpebra per inscizio es alonguada, aquo no notz en deguna causa.	And if the swelling is decreasing within the eyelid, you must delve into its depth, then lift the eyelid and suspend the swelling with a bandage, except as necessary at the beginning, and press it from all sides; and if due to some cause the eyelid becomes elongated, do not notice it for any reason.
E aprop la incizio, lava le huel am aygua salada; e cura le loc am aquo que encarna entro que sia sanat.	Then make the incision, wash the wound with salted water; and treat it with incarnated water until it heals.
Capitol .x.	Chapter X.
De la cura axcirnah en la palpebra desus del huel.	Regarding the treatment of the eye's eyelid.
Axcirnath es grays le qual es engendrat en las tunicas de la palpebra desus, e majorment endeve als enfantz, agrava les huels de aquels et accideyso a lor catartz le mayti; e no podon reguardar la claror del solelh per aquo quar lagremas se coytan ad aquels.	Axcirnath is an inflammation of the eyelid, which is usually caused in childhood and can affect the eyes of adults, leading to their clouding and causing tears to form; and because of this, they cannot see the clarity of the sun due to the tears.
E per so tu vezes aquels jaser sobre les lors caras tot temps, e sobre les lors caras dormen; e so a las palpebras de lor dejos les sobrecils humidas, las quals ja ha cuberta imflacio, e iminencia de accernac apparent es en l’uelh; e que quant tu premes le loc am les tieus ditz, tu centes accernac entro aquels.	And so you must perform these actions over their faces all the time, and over their faces while they sleep; and so the eyelids of their eyes remain constantly moist, which has already caused inflammation, and the imminent occurrence of acute pain is apparent in the eye; and when you press the area with your fingers, you feel acute pain within them.
E alcuna manieyra de opperacio es en aquel que le malaute pausa le sieu cap en le tieu se, e aprop pausa drap de li e de lu fay calgua, e fay de lu cercle segon la quantitat la qual contena arthernach de tota partida, e aprop pausa aquel sobre aquela e prem am les tieus ditz de tota per que sia agreguat arcernac en le mieg del cercle, e aprop fen en le mieg de aquela humiditat am spatum inscident am fissura per la latitut, e la fissura no sia major que la fissura que es fayta en flaubotomia.	And certain procedures are performed in which the patient's head is placed on a pillow, and a cloth is laid over them, and cold applications are made, according to the amount of pus from the entire operation, and then that is placed over one area, and by pressing with your fingers all around it, more pus is collected in the middle of the circle, and then the application ends in the middle of that area, humidifying the wound with a spatula incidentally on the fissures, so that the fissure does not become larger than the one made in phlebotomy.
Mays en le preon cove que tu fendas la codena tota entro que pervenguas ad arcernach, quar en las mays desposicios proceseys arcernach per fissura segon la forma de grayseza blanca.	Place in the hollow of your hand that you cut open the cord completely until you reach the cavity, for in the most delicate positions, treatment is done through an opening according to the shape of the white ganglion.
Donc extratz aquela am draps los quals tu as envolopatz entre les tieus ditz a las partidas deforo e revolv entre la ma dextra e sinistre entro que sia dispargut.	Therefore, remove those clothes that you have wrapped around the affected parts outside and twist them with your right and left hand until they are completely separated.
E guarda te que no ajustes en la fissura per so que am le spatum no pervenguas al huel e ladescas aquel.	And be careful not to press on the fissure so that the spatula does not reach the wound and dislocate it.
Mays si no apar a tu arternach en le comensament de la fissura, mays que tu ajustes en la fissura un petit am fecilitat entro que procesisca arternach; e aprop extratz aquela ayssi quo havem dit; e aprop submargeys draps de li en aygua e vi agre e pausa les sobre le loc e estrenh aquels am polvils.	If it does not appear to your assistant at the beginning of the fissure, then you adjust the fissure with a little ease until treatment begins; and then remove those clothes as we have said; and take cloths from them in water, mix vinegar and apply them over the area, and cover these with dry powders.
E so alcus que trissan sal e pausan aquel en la conquavitat de la fissura per so que aquo que es remas de aquela humiditat.	And so, some who tremble take salt and place it in the cavity of the fissure to draw out that which is moist from it.
E aprop cura aquel entro que sia sanat.	And then cure that which is inside so it becomes healthy.
Mays si accideys en le loc apostema caut, lahoras cura aquel am emplastres cedatils entro que sia sanat.	If an accident occurs at the infected site while using cautery, then treat it with dressings until it heals.
Capitol .xi.	Chapter XI.
De manieyras de tactimi del huel.	On the subject of manual manipulation.
Quan en las palpebras dels huels so natz pels ajustatz dejos les pels naturals e so antiquatz, lahoras aquels noso al huel e fan endevenir manieras de malautias ayssi cum lacrimas assiduas e mollificacio de palpebras e tela entro que aquo sia causa de destruccio del huel que s’apela tactinir del huel, e cura se en quatre manieyras: o per cauteri am foc; o am medicina acuta segon que denant es dit en le capitol de cauteri; o es fayt atactini per inscizio e sutura; o per cannas segon que yeu diyre.	When the eyelids of the eyes become inflamed due to the pressing of foreign bodies, and this condition persists, the result is a painful eye and causes frequent tears, swelling of the eyelids, and discomfort in moving the eyes—a condition known as conjunctivitis. It is treated in four ways: either with a hot cautery; or with acute medicine as previously described in the chapter on cautery; or by incision and suture; or with canes (as will be explained).
E donc cove que tu pauses le cap del malaute en le tieu se; aprop converteys la palpebra del uelh am la tua ma sinistra, e si es convertida, bo es; e sino, entromet agulha en aquela en la qual sia fiel de la partida pus dejos de la palpebra, e fay penetrar la agulha am fiel desus, e aquo sia — prop del marge de la palpebra en le qual naysso les pels — prop dels pels, e tira le fiel a las partidas desus am la palpebra, e converteys aquela am le ray.	And so take care that you place the head of the patient in a suitable position; then turn the eyelid with your left hand, and if it is turned, it is good; but if not, insert a needle into the part where the eyelid meets the skin, and let the needle penetrate through the skin toward the edge of the eyelid where there are no hairs, and pull the thread from its place against the eyelid, and turn it to the side.
E aprop fen en la partida dedintz de la palpebra dejos les pels ajustatz am spatum inscidentz del lacrimal major entro al lacrimal mendre; e aprop extratz le fiel e pausa dejos la palpebra polvilhs petitz de coto o de drap, e aprop senha sobre la palpebra am tenta, e sia ayssi cum figura de fuelha de mirt.	Then, in the space between the eyelid and the skin, carefully trim the hairs with a scissor-like instrument; then extract the thread and place it beneath the eyelid using small pincers or cloth, and press down on the eyelid with your finger, shaping it like a mirthful smile.
Mays empero cove que sia la figura segon la quantitat de helevacio de la palpebra, quar aquo ja es diversificat en les homes, quar de aquels es le quals indigeys que sia inscidit de la palpebra gran quantitat segon la quantitat per la qual la palpebra es mollificada.	However, it is important to note that the shape should be adjusted according to the amount of inflammation in the eyelid, as it varies among individuals; for those with significant inflammation, a larger incision may be necessary to soften the eyelid.
E aprop fen am le spatum sobre las doas linhas las quals has senhadas, e comensa del lacrimal major entro al lacrimal menor.	And then cut open the splint along both lines that you have marked, beginning from the lacrimal duct major to the lacrimal duct minor.
E si’ la tua fissura prop dels pels naturals ayssi cum es la grossetut del rey.	And if your fracture is near the natural hairline, it should also be as thick as the king's.
E aprop met le onci en un dels dos angles de la codena, e aprop excoria aquela tota, e aprop ajusta am la scitura las doas labias am gula o fiel de lana subtil, e abstergeys le sanc, e fay adherir aquo que superflueys dels fiels sobre dos sobrecils am alcunas causas enviscans, si voles far aquo, e sino, non cures.	And then place the claw in one of the two corners of the wound, scrape it thoroughly, and adjust the suture at both edges with silk or fine wool thread, clean the pus, and make any excess from the medications adhere to the two eyebrows for some reasons entwined, if you wish to do so; otherwise, do not treat it.
E aprop leyssa la sutura dels fiels entro a tres dias o quatre, e aprop cura aquo.	And then change the suture of the wound every three or four days, and take care of it.
E si vols, layssa la plagua ses sutura, e cura aquela am aquo que exsicca e constrenh, quar la palpebra es alevada deves la sigillacio de la plagua e la agreguacio de lu; mays sutura es milor E donc aysso diysso les antics de taxanir.	And if you wish, leave the wound open without suture, and treat it with something that dries and tightens, as the eyelid should be lifted after the sealing of the wound and the addition of medications; but a tighter suture is better. Thus, I have told you the ancient practices of taxanir.
Mays empero en lu sia sollicitut sobre le malaute, e es de bona operacio, e no es en lu temor.	However, be careful in attending to the patient, as it is a delicate operation, and there is no need to fear.
E es autra manieyra en taxmir, e es que senhes sobre la palpebra figura ayssi cum fuelha de mirt, e aprop eleva la palpebra am tres uncis segreguatz e congreguatz segon aquesta forma:	And there is another way to treat it, where one sees a figure like a grain of mulberry on the eyelid, and then raises the eyelid with three precise incisions, separating and bringing it together in this form:
Mays si no es possible aquo, tener les uncis, e aquo no es engualhat, lahoras pren una agula en la qual haia fil e met aquela en le mieg de la figura, e entromet le autre fiel prop le lacrimal major, e·l fiel segon prop le lacrimal mendre, e ajusta entre les tieus ditz les fiels am equalitat, e aprop am aquels eleva la tua ma am elevacio engual, eleva tota la codena sobre la qual es senhat ayssi cum havem recomtat.	If this is not possible, having the incisions, and it is not similar to what has been described, then take an agule with a thread and insert that into the middle of the figure, and then insert the other two threads close to the lacrimal canals, the first closer to the larger canal, and the second closer to the smaller one, and adjust between them so that the threads are equal in length, and then with your hand at the same elevation as before, lift the entire eyelid as we have recomposed.
E aprop ajusta las doas labias de la plagua am sutura, e cura aquel entro que sia sanat.	And then adjust the two edges of the wound with stitches, and heal that which is clean.
Mays si accideys apostema deves la tua inscizio o la tua fissura, seda aquel apostema am cerot e a lu semblantz, e am enguentz.	If an abscess occurs after your incision or fistula, treat it with wax and similar materials, and apply heat to it.
E alcunas veguadas endeve a la palpebra que·ls sieus pels sian convertitz, adonc cove que tu uses en aquela de aquo que havem dit de inscizio; mays sutura en quascus es mays artificial.	And in some cases, it is necessary to treat the eyelid when its hair turns, so use what we have mentioned regarding incision; however, stitching can be more artificial in some instances.
Ataxinir am cannas es segon aquesta forma:	Inserting needles is done in this manner:
e es que tu convertas la palpebra e scindas la figura qu’es dedintz segon que he recontat; e aprop per art fay doas cannas o doas astelas subtils de las quals longitut sia segon la longitut de la palpebra e la latitut de lor sia mendra de la latitut del spatum.	and it is that you turn the eyelid and divide the figure within as I have mentioned; then, with art, insert two needles or two thin threads whose length corresponds to the length of the eyelid and the width of their passage should be proportional to the width of the space.
E tu ja has inscidit en las extremitatz de quascunas partidas, la on tenes les fils.	And you have already made incisions at the ends of each piece where you have the threads.
Aprop agregua quascuna am subtilitat subre aquo que superflueys de la palpebra del huel, e constres las cannas de quascunas partidas am fort strictura, e layssa aquela per alcus jorns, quar la codena per la strictura morira e sira denegada e se poyrira entro que per si meteyssa cayra.	Nearby, add some subtleties beneath what exceeds from the upper eyelid, constrict the canals of any broken parts with strong tightness, and leave it for a few days, because the cord will die due to the tightness and will be deprived; it will then fall by itself when it has weakened.
Mays si es tardat, lahoras trenca la am las toroyras, e aprop cura la plagua entro que sia sanat.	If it is delayed, then break open the abscesses, and treat the infection until it is healed.
Donc cum es solidada, la palpebra es elevada e les pels no pungo.	Therefore, when it is solidified, the eyelid is raised and the hair does not hurt.
E aquesta es la forma de doas cannas las quals faras segon aquesta forma:	And this is the way to make two canals according to this form:
e haia la quantitat de la longitut e de la latitut ni mays ni mens.	and it should have the quantity of length and breadth neither more nor less.
Capitol .xii.	Chapter .xii.
De elevacio de pels pungentz en le huel am agula quan le pel es dur.	On the removal of sharp hairs from the body, especially when the hair is hard.
Quan son pels no-naturals, durs e aspres e pungentz les huels, lahoras la operacio en lu es que tu prenguas agula subtil e pauses en aquela fiel de ceda subtil e leon, e aprop que tu ajustes las extremitatz de lu e nozes quascu en manieyra mot subtil.	When the hairs are not natural, hard, and sharp in the flesh, then the operation on them requires that you use a fine needle, rest it on that delicate scale of silk and lion's fur, and adjust the extremities of the device very gently.
E sia la longitut dels fiels de quantitat de una palma.	And the length of the silk threads should be about the size of a palm.
E aprop tu compon2 autre fiel subtil dejos lu en breu, e nuza las extremitatz de aquel si tu·t vols.	And then you compose another very fine thread beneath it shortly, and adjust the ends of that if you wish.
E aprop pause le malaute le sieu cap en le tieu se, e sia prop del solelh per que la tua obra sia declarada, quar es operacio subtil e menuda.	Then place the patient's head in a small position near the sun so that your work can be seen, as it is a delicate and precise operation.
E aprop intromet la agulha en la razit del pel ajustat la qual ha necessitat de engen, e fay aquela penetrar en la palpebra festinantment entro que extraguas aquela desus le pel natural.	And then insert the needle into the root of the hair, adjusting it as needed, and make it penetrate the eyelid swiftly until you extract it from its natural hair.
E aprop tire le pel entro desus e intromet aquel en alixati, e sian les pels un o dos o tres e no mays.	Then pull the hair out from its roots and insert it into the oil, taking care that one or two or three hairs are enough and not more.
E aprop tira la tua ma am aquel entro que·l pel sia fora-gitat am alixolati en la palpebra am le pel natural.	Then gently pull your hand away, allowing the hair to be extracted from the oil into the eyelid, along with the natural hair.
Mays si es atirat alixalati e non es gitat le pel, atiraras alixati a las partidas dejos am le fiel le qual tu has compost am aquela, entro qu’en sia gitat alixalati del trau sobira.	If the oil is not extracted with the hair but remains on the eyelid, reapply the oil to the areas you have treated until it is completely removed from the wound above.
E vegas aquela am la visio del huel, quar lahoras tu gitaras alixati e lo fiel, e grotan quascu e clautz le huel, e laysse le claus per dos dias o tres, entro que·l pel adheresca al sieu loc e nasque sobre aquel bona carn.	And then examine the wound, since you will remove the oil and the faithful (bandage) and clean any debris or dirt in the wound, and leave the bandage for two or three days, until the hair sticks to its place and a new layer of skin forms over it.
E si es mays breu le pel, lahoras tu ajusta un pel lonc dels pels naturals, e es elevat am aquel, o que·l leysses entro que sia alonguat aprop alcu spazi, e lehoras tu eleva aquel.	And if the hair is very short, you adjust a longer natural hair, raised to that point where it should be elongated, and then you raise that one.
Capitol .xiii.	**Capitol XIII.**
De la cura de ehacratir la qual ve en la palpebra desus.	**Of the treatment of a condition that appears on the eyelid above.**
Quan ve en le huel ehacratir, e es contraccio de la palpebra quan es contrayta en sus, o a dextra o a sinistra partida, per mala consolidacio de plagua o de seccio o de cauteri, e es apelada leporina, e aquesta ahercrati o es natural o accidental, e es fayta per consolidacio de plagua o de seccios o de cauteri, o per semblantz a lor malcuratz.	**When you notice a condition on the eyelid, which is characterized by its contraction when the eyelid is closed, to the right or left side, due to poor healing of a wound or section or cauterization, and it is called lepra, this condition is either natural or accidental, caused by the healing of wounds or sections or cauterization, or similar to them.**
May la manieyra de la operacio en lu es que tu fendas aquela consolidacio e que separes las labias de lu, e pauses en lu en aquo que es entre aquelas una meca de drap de li, e ligues aquelas entro que sian sanadas.	**The method of operation on it is that you open up that consolidation and separate the lips, placing them in a position where there is space between them, like a pocket of cloth, and then bind them together until they heal.**
E no cove que tu uses de curacio de lu de las causas las quals exsiccan, constrenho; quar si tu fas aquo retorna alixacratir pus mal que nulh temps no foc habantz.	And be aware that you must not treat it from the causes that dry out; for if you do so, you will only make it worse, and in no time at all, there will be even more trouble.
Usa en aquela de causas que mollifico ayssi cum es fenugrec, e embroca am la aygua en la qual son coytz altea e semensa de li, o enguent dyaquilon, le qual sia liquefayt am alcu dels olis, e submergeys en aquel la meca, e cura am aquel.	Use one of those causes that softens as well, such as fenugreek, and boil it in water in which the seeds have been ground finely or mix with oil, apply a compress to that area, and treat it thusly.
E lo tesaur de la tua curacio es que tu perforsses am tot engen que no sia consolidat segon la forma que foc al comensament.	And the treasure of your cure is that you pierce through all means that are not solidified according to the form in which it began.
E aquesta operacio la qual havem dita, no es sino alcuna rectificacio de ehalixacrati que no retorna la forma del loc segon que foc denant.	And this operation that we have spoken of is nothing but a correction of the imbalance that does not return to the form of the place as it was before.
Capitol .xiiii.	Chapter XIII.
De la cura de ehacrati le qual es fayt en la palpebra dejos.	Regarding the treatment of a hematoma on the eyelid.
Aquesta alxacrati la qual es fayta en la palpebra dejos, la qual es nompnada vertadierament alxacrati; e es de lu alcuna natural, autra accidental.	This hematoma, which is formed on the eyelid and is often referred to as a black eye, is not properly called a hematoma; it can be either of natural origin or accidental.
Mays accidental es fayta per plagua o per scissura o per cauteri o per autres semblantz.	An accidental hematoma can be caused by a blow, a cut, a burn, or other similar events.
E la via de la operacio de lu es que tu prenguas una agula en la qual haga fil doble, e fiques aquela en la carn, e que la fassas passar del lacrimal de senestre entro al lacrimal dextre, entro que·l fil pervengua en las doas extremitatz de la carn.	And the method of operation is that you take a needle with double thread and insert it into the flesh, passing from the left tear duct to the right one, so that the thread goes through both ends of the flesh.
E aprop exten la carn a las partidas desus am la agula e cus aquela am la agula, e inscideys am spatum ample.	Then stretch the flesh apart from its sides using the needle and cut with a scalpel when you have freed it with the needle, making sure to use a wide blade.
E donc si retorne la figura de la palpebre segon que cove, bo es; e sino, pren le ray e pausa aquel en la figura fenduda, e am aquel converteys la palpebra, e fen las doas fissuras en le latz de la palpebra dejos.	And so return the lid of the eyelid to its proper position if it is closed; otherwise, take a pin and press it into the split, then turn the eyelid over and make both slits in the edge of the eyelid.
E sian las extremitatz de las doas fissuras de dos angles de la inscizio, la qual has fayta entro que concurren, e sia de lor fayt angle entro que quan se congreguan sia fayta figura de lor.	And the ends of both slits should be at two angles of the incision you have made, where they meet, and by making their angle there, the figure of them becomes complete.
E aquesta figura es letra greca: la landa.	And this figure resembles the Greek letter lambda.
E aprop osta la carn aquela per la quantitat que es le latz de lu agut dejos de lu, aquo que siec la palpebra.	And then press the flesh with your thumb as much as is needed to close the eyelid, which is what we call the palpebra.
E aprop ajusta las partz seperadas e cos aquelas am le fil de lana; e aprop cura aquelas am aquo que havem dit de las medicinas mollificativas e de las calguas entro que sia sanat.	And then adjust the separated parts with the thread; and next, apply the treatments we have mentioned for softening medications and cold compresses to ensure healing.
E si alxacrati endeve per fissura o sutura o cauteri, lahoras cove que tu fendas am fissura plana sobre les pels de la palpebra segon que es precedit.	And if you need to increase the opening with a cut, suture or cautery, be careful to make a flat cut on the skin of the eyelid as mentioned before.
E aprop separa am la calgua entre doas labias segon que havem dit.	Then separate the mucous membrane between two lips as we have said.
En la suma del sermo de la cura de alxacrati quan es desus o dejos, que corra en lu operacio, segon que es preparat de la forma de alxacrati, e aquela es en forma de motas diversitatz.	In the entire discourse on incision when it is above or below, allowing it to flow during the operation, according to how it is prepared in terms of incision, and that is in a variety of forms.
E le artifexs savi totz temps prepara engen en quascuna manieyra la qual es possibla a lu entro que fassa retornar la figura a la forma natural, o prop de aquela, e aquel malaute segon que a lu conveneys de la operacio e dels strumentz en las majors disposicios.	And the skilled artisan always prepares tricks in every possible way so that within he can return the figure to its natural form, or close to it, and treat that malady according to what suits him for the operation and tools in the best dispositions.
Capitol .xv.	Chapter .XV.
De la adherencia de la palpebra am la conjunctiva o am la cornea.	From the adhesion of the eyelid to the conjunctiva or to the cornea.
Quan accideys aquesta consolidacio a motz homes enayssi que sia solidada la palpebra pus desus am le album del huel, e sia prohibida de la facilitat del movement e de las suas obras naturals, donc cove que tu entrometas la extramitat del ray dejos la palpebra, e eleva en sus aquela, o exten aquela am le unci.	When this adhesion occurs in most people, the eyelid seems to be solidified on the white part of the eye, preventing the ease of movement and its natural functions; therefore, it is necessary to insert your finger between the eyelid and the sclera, and elevate the eyelid towards the upper part or extend it with pressure.
E aprop tu inscideys la adherencia am spatum subtil, le qual no sia am acuitat de las inscisios, habantz obtus un petit per so que·l malaute no sia inquietat deves la operacio, e remau le spatum que no ledesca le huel am la sua acuitat.	And then you insert a thin spatula to separate the adhesion, not using sharp incisions, but rather blunting it slightly so that the patient feels no discomfort during the operation, and remove the spatula without damaging the eye's sensitivity.
E sia la tua inscizio quays excorjan aquela adherencia am facilitat entro que sia retornada la palpebra segon la sua forma natural e que sia sanada tota la adherencia.	And your incision should carefully remove that adhesion, facilitating the return of the eyelid to its natural position, and healing all the adhesion.
E aprop tu met en le huel aygua salada am la qual tu laves; o distilla en lu de zunia dissolvut en l’aygua.	And then you put in the affected area salt water with which you wash; or distill sun-heated oil dissolved in water into it.
E aprop separa entre la palpebra e l’huel am calgua de li, e pausa sobre le huel lana infuza en album de huou, e aprop le tertz jorn usa de causas consolidativas entro que sia sanat.	Then you separate the eyelid from the eye with warm water, and place over the eye a woolen compress infused with egg white, and on the third day use consolidating causes while it heals.
Capitol .xvi.	**Chapter XVI.**
De inscizio de ungla e de eminencia de carn dels lacrimals.	**On the Knowledge of Clouding and Protrusion of the Membranes of the Eyes.**
Sapias que ungla es segon dos manieyras, quar o es nervosa, e es semblant a ciphac dur subtil; o es no-nervosa, semblant a humiditat blanca congilada, la qual quan ferr la toca, o es forsat aquela prendre am onci, es abscindida e le onci no es ficat en lu.	Know that clouding is in two manners: either it is nervous, resembling a delicate hard shell, or non-nervous, resembling white frozen moisture, which when pricked forces itself out, and the point does not remain in it.
E amdos las specias no comensan sino del lacrimal major entro que va petit a petit que cobre la vista e prohibeys le lum e·l movement de huel.	And both spices do not begin until the major tear duct, as it gradually covers the sight, prohibiting light and movement of the eye.
Mays la manieyra del obrar en la inscizio de lu es que·l malaute pause le sieu cap en le tieu se, e aprop obre les huels de lu, e eleva la palpebra am la tua ma, e aprop colligeys la ungla am onci de pauca duplicacio e exten aquela a las partidas desus.	The manner of working in the incision of the eye is that the patient fixes their gaze downward, and the doctor opens the eyelids with his hand, raises the upper eyelid with his thumb, and carefully extends it over the lower eyelid.
E aprop pren una agula e entromet en aquela un pel de cavalh o de buou o de vaqua, o de semblantz, o de fiel fort, o duplica la extremitat de la agulha petit a petit e fica aquela en le mieg de la ungla, e penetra aquela am la agulha, e lia am fiel la ungla; e exten aquela a las partidas desus, e excorja am le pel le latz de la ungla lo qual siec la pupilla.	And then take a needle and, using a horsehair or a similar thin material, carefully pass the needle through the center of the eyelid, extending it towards the edge, piercing the eyelid with the needle, and binding it with the thread; stretch that to the sides, and excise the hair at the edge of the eyelid which is obstructing the pupil.
E ayssi tu sieguas aquela am le pel entro al derier de lu.	And so you continue to remove the hair within the eyelid's fold.
E aprop tu inscideys le romanent en la razitz del lacrimal am spatum subtil o am petitas forfexs, e leysa la carn del lacrimal natural per so que per inscizio de aquela no endevengua fluxs de lagremas continuabla.	And then carefully cut the lint in the root of the tear duct with a thin spatula or small scissors, and expose the tissue of the natural tear duct so that by cutting of that one does not cause continuous flow of tears.
E alscunas vetz la ungla am le sol onci estenduda o am fiel, ayssi co havem dit, e aprop sia excurjat am spatum leon del qual aquesta es la forma de lu:	And some also apply the ointment to the inflamed area as it is extended or hardened, as we have said, and then carefully scrape off the excess with a sharp spatula, which is the form of this one.
E guarda te que am le spatum no toques la tunica cornea e que avengua en lu ruptura, e que la pupilla sia perforada.	And be careful that with the spatula you do not touch the corneal tunic and cause it to rupture, and that the pupil is not perforated.
Aprop la inscizio geta en le huel un pauc de sal trissa o di cief fayt de siniar, e leyssa aquel entro al autre dia; e aprop cura aquel am aquo que cove entro que sia sanat.	After the incision, place a little salt or a fine cloth over it and leave it for another day; then carefully tend to it until it is healed.
E si la ungla no es nervoza e no podes metre la agulha, ni es ficada en aquela le onci, lahoras motas veguadas aquesta specia de ungla es curada am medicinas, e es sanada ayssi cum yeu e recomtat en la divisio.	And if the inflammation is not nervous and you cannot insert the needle, nor is it fixed in that place, then look for this special type of inflammation to be cured with medicines, and so it is healed as you see fit and cut off at the division.
E si tu vols inscindir aquela, lahoras tu obre le huel del malaute e pren spatum subtil leon de freul acuitat segon aquesta forma:	And if you wish to incise it, open the wound of the patient and take a thin piece of sharp iron according to this form:
am subtilitat.	with subtlety
E si vezes que aquela es rarificada e es confugida e empren en aquela razit, lahoras distilla de la tua ora en le huel de cief fayt de siniar o am cief rog o am sal trissat, e opila le huel entro a l’autre dia.	If, however, it becomes hardened and is resistant to the incision, then distill from your time in the wound with a sharp tool of pure vinegar or strong alcohol or salt water, and keep the wound closed for another day.
E aprop itera sobre aquela la operacio entro que sia remaugut tot aquo que es de lu, sino que·l contrari apostema caut sia en le huel, quar lahoras tu leyssa aquela, e cura al comensament la apostema entro que sia sanat.	And repeat the operation on that part until everything that is foreign is removed, otherwise a foul wound will form in the wound, for if you leave it, the infection will spread until it heals.
E aprop itera la tua operacio sobre aquela am razo entro que sia sanat.	And repeat your operation on that part until it heals.
La emenencia de la carn lacrimal, si notz en le huel per gran nocument, sia suspendut am onci; e inscideys aquela de aquela una partida, e no ultimes la inscizio per so que no inscidesqua fluxs de lagremas.	The importance of the lacrimal gland, if noticed in the eye due to great damage, should be suspended immediately; and incise it from one side, without finishing the incision so as not to interrupt the flow of tears.
E aprop distilla en le lacrimal cief rog e fayt de siniar entro que sia sanat.	And then distill the main lacrimal gland carefully and make incisions until it is healed.
Capitol .xvii.	**Chapter XVII**
De inscizio de alguazardenic e de aquo que es nascut de carn ajustada en le huel.	On the incision of abscesses and on what is born from attached flesh in the eye.
Alcunas veguadas en les huels de alcus es nascuda carn roga, e es sobre-pausada entro que cobre la pupilla, o apropinqua o estrenh sobre las palpebras e fort leu comprem las palpebras a las partidas deforo e es assemblada a roza de balaustra.	In some cases, in the eyes of certain individuals, there is born infected flesh, which presses over the pupil or draws near to it on the eyelids, and strongly pulls the eyelids apart, as if by a harness.
Mays la operacio en lu es que·l malaute pausa le sieu cap en le tieu se; e aprop obre les huels de aquel e colligeys tota aquela carn am oncis convenientz ad aquo, e te aquo am una forcep o am cesti; e aprop inscindiys la carn el comensament entro que tot sia finit am le encisori, e guarda te del huel que no ledescas aquel deves la tua operacio.	The surgical procedure involves the patient holding their thigh with one hand while another assistant holds their leg, and yet another assists on their chest, thus immobilizing them; open the wound, collect all the infected tissue using scissors suitable for this purpose, either with forceps or a basket; cut the flesh from the beginning until everything is finished with the scalpel, and be careful of the wound, lest you damage it during your operation.
E sia la tua inscizio am la qual inscides aquelas o am espatum le qual nos havem recomtat en la inscizio de la ungla, o am petitas forfexs am las quals es colligit ascebel segon que vindra la forma de lu aprop aquest capitol.	And your incision should be the one that incises these or excises the pus we have extracted during the operation on the finger, or small forceps collected with great care according to the shape of it, as this chapter will explain.
Donc cum es complida la tua inscizio e es remauguda tota aquela carn, lahoras omple le huel de sal trissa, o destilla en lu polvera roga e semblantz a lu de las medicinas corrossivas, e pausa sobre le huel deforo coto am album de huou entro que sia asegurat de apostema caut.	So, once your incision is complete and all that infected flesh has been removed, fill the wound with salt or sprinkle it with a powder made from herbs similar to corrosives used in medicine, then apply a clean bandage over it, ensuring there's no risk of post-operative abscess.
E si roman alcuna causa de alguardenici e es senhoragat sanc caut, e temes apostema caut, lahoras leyssa le huel e cura aquela apostema am aquo que ceda aquela apostema, e aprop itera sobre aquel am operacio entro que sia sanat, e semblantment fay en la carn ajustada la qual accideys en le huel de aquesta especia.	And if there is any cause of inflammation from a foreign body and it is accompanied by severe pain, then you should examine the wound and treat that ulcer with something that will heal that ulcer, and continue with that treatment until the ulcer is healed, and do as seems best for the attached flesh that has occurred in this specific case.
Mays empero tu cove que alienes tota curacio del huel freul per via natural o per via accidental, obran am ferr, e no metas la tua ma en alcuna de aquestas operacios entro que veges que aquel membre sia suffertant aquela operacio.	Although it may seem that all treatment of this severe wound must be done through natural or accidental means, using a knife, do not place your hand on any of these operations until you see that the member has endured that operation sufficiently.
Capitol .xviii.	**Chapter XVIII**
De colleccio de sabel en le huel.	**On the Collection of Knowledge in Wounds**
Sabel so venas rogas las quals son testudas sobre le huel e prohibeysso al vesement la sua operacio, e develican le huel am longitut de dias.	Knowledge comes in various forms, some of which are hard and resistant to treatment, preventing any attempt at their extraction, and these wounds heal slowly over many days.
Donc necessari es al comensament que tu consideres si le huel en le qual es sabel es fort e en lu no es autra malautia que sabel, lahoras tu colligeys aquel sabel.	Therefore, at the beginning, it is necessary that you consider whether the pain in which you know it is strong and in which there is no other illness known to you, then you will collect that knowledge.
E es que tu comandes al malaute que pause le sieu cap en le tieu se, e aprop suspen aquelas venas am un onci o am dos segon la tua prudencia; e sia aquel onci de subtil duplicacio segon aquesta forma:	And command the patient to hold their breath while you compress the veins, one or two at a time, according to your discretion. And make that compression subtle and in this manner:
o so dos oncis gradantment en un cos segon aquesta forma:	or make two compressions gradually on the body in this manner:
E aprop sian colligidas aquelas venas am forses subtils, am subtilitat, e abstergeys le sanc hora aprop hora, entro que vegas aquelas venas esser remaugudas del huel e sian revolgudas.	And once the veins are compressed with subtle force, and at the right moment, while you watch for the pain to disappear and see that the veins are filled with blood and are pulsating.
E guarda te que tu no ledes le huel am las extremitatz del spatum; e si’ la tua operacio en le miegjorn denant le solelh, e sias mot ferm en la tua operacio que no inscidas sino aquelas venas.	And be careful not to cause pain in the joints of the foot; and if your operation is in the morning before the sun rises, be very firm in your operation, piercing only the veins.
E quan tu auras complitz, lahoras tu distilla en le huel cief vert o rog per que am sa acuitat corrodesca aquo que es remaugut del sabel.	And when you have finished, then distil the best verdigris or rust onto what has been removed from the wound.

Capitol .xxii.	**Chapter XXII**
De curacio de alconati.	**On the Healing of Alconati**
Aquesta malautia que es apelada alconati no es sino sania la qual es ajustada en le huel semblant a aygua dessendent e no es aquela.	This condition known as alconati is not truly a sickness but a healthy swelling that resembles water flowing from the joint, and it is not [what we] think it to be.

E si no descendra en jos, sapias que es aygua.	And if it does not come down below, you will know that it is water.
